function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Researchers from multiple institutions and countries collaborating on principles","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases through international collaboration","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and social distancing protocols during in-person collaboration","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, such as video conferencing and virtual whiteboards","People":"Researchers involved in international collaboration","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Focus on social science research during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Potential for increased exposure to contagious diseases during field research","Mitigation":"Use personal protective equipment (PPE) and follow strict hygiene protocols during field research","Technologies":"PPE, disinfectants, and contact tracing apps","People":"Social science researchers conducting field research","Owner":"Research institutions, researchers themselves"},{"Description":"Challenges to validity in research studies","Impact":"Potential for biased or inaccurate research outcomes due to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional data collection methods and validation measures to address the impact of the pandemic on research validity","Technologies":"Advanced data collection and analysis tools, remote survey platforms","People":"Research teams and scholars conducting research studies","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"}]}
